SEARCH
Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter

Class NetDatacenterBroker

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter.NetDatacenterBroker
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class NetDatacenterBroker extends SimEntity
NetDatacentreBroker represents a broker acting on behalf of Datacenter provider. It hides VM management, as vm creation, submission of cloudlets to these VMs and destruction of VMs.
NOTE: This class is an example only. It works on behalf of a provider not for users. One has to implement interaction with user broker to this broker.
Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 3.0
Author:
Saurabh Kumar Garg
